scripts.docs: rm -rf ./images && cp -r www/documentation/images . && prettier --prose-wrap always --write './www/**/*.md'; cd www/documentation; generate-md --layout github --input index.md --output .; electron-pdf --marginsType 0 --input "`pwd`/index.html" --output ../../out/ControlByWeb\ Documentation.pdf
scripts.init: mkdir -p out && python -m venv .venv && . .venv/bin/activate && python -m pip install pip setuptools wheel && env LDFLAGS="-L$(brew --prefix openssl)/lib" CFLAGS="-I$(brew --prefix openssl)/include" SWIG_FEATURES="-cpperraswarn -includeall -I$(brew --prefix openssl)/include" pip install M2Crypto lxml && rm -rf out/driverpackager && git clone git@github.com:snap-one/drivers-driverpackager.git out/driverpackager
scripts.package: mkdir -p out && ./.venv/bin/python3 out/driverpackager/dp3/driverpackager.py . out controlbyweb.c4zproj && cd out && zip control4-controlbyweb.zip controlbyweb.c4z ControlByWeb\ Documentation.pdf
scripts.build: npm run fmt && npm run docs && npm run update-driver-version && npm run update-driver-modified-date && npm run package
